ivardefs.name: effectiveTime
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the time during which this Contract ValuedItem information is effective.

ivardefs.name: factor
ivardefs.desc: A real number that represents a multiplier used in determining the overall value of the Contract Valued Item delivered. The concept of a Factor allows for a discount or surcharge multiplier to be applied to a monetary amount.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Identifies a Contract Valued Item instance.

ivardefs.name: linkId_
ivardefs.desc: Id  of the clause or question text related to the context of this valuedItem in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

ivardefs.name: net
ivardefs.desc: Expresses the product of the Contract Valued Item unitQuantity and the unitPriceAmt. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if not suppl

ivardefs.name: points
ivardefs.desc: An amount that expresses the weighting (based on difficulty, cost and/or resource intensiveness) associated with the Contract Valued Item delivered. The concept of Points allows for assignment of point values for a Contract Valued Item, such that a moneta

ivardefs.name: quantity
ivardefs.desc: Specifies the units by which the Contract Valued Item is measured or counted, and quantifies the countable or measurable Contract Valued Item instances.

ivardefs.name: securityLabelNumber_
ivardefs.desc: A set of security labels that define which terms are controlled by this condition.

ivardefs.name: unitPrice
ivardefs.desc: A Contract Valued Item unit valuation measure.
